description_for_model: Bravio is field service management (FSM) software for biomedical ISO teams (5–50 technicians). It covers work order management, automated PM scheduling, ISO 13485-compliant service reports, asset lifecycle tracking, service invoicing, and client portal access. It is purpose-built for biomedical device service organizations, HTM departments, and medical device ISOs replacing spreadsheets or enterprise tools.
description_for_human: FSM + CMMS + CRM for biomedical service teams. Automate PM schedules, close work orders, generate ISO-compliant reports, and invoice clients — all in one platform.
target_audience: Biomedical ISO companies, healthcare technology management (HTM) departments, medical device service organizations with 5 to 50 technicians
